metadata.synopsis: One liner for Gossiper_002 outside the Baldur's Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the gossiper outside the Baldurs Mouth building in CTY_Main_A at coords 77.5, 41, -25

0.speaker: Carys
0.text: Now, don't believe anything Cait over there tells you. She's an awful liar.

1.speaker: Carys
1.text: Don't get me wrong, I like a wee gossip as much as the rest, but Caitlin does get a bit carried away with the tall tales.

2.speaker: Carys
2.text: Say, I thought I recognised you from somewhere! Never seen the Mouth give such a glowing write-up. Good for you.

3.speaker: Carys
3.text: Keep your distance, now. I'll not consort with miscreants like you.
